snippet.title: The War in Chiapas - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: The War in Chiapas is a 2D stealth action-adventure game developed by Bandprice. Control a group of young people who enter the jungle of Chiapas, Mexico, in the eighties, to form a guerrilla whose objective is to create an army to overthrow the government through a new revolution, however, a paramilitary group appears unexpectedly. The War in Chiapas is coming soon to PC (Steam).
